Rails Project

TimeSheet Application
  • Rails
  • Ruby
  • JQuery
  • HTML
  • CSS
  • Sqlite

I built a time tracking application to help freelancers and small organizations track time in order to bill their clients. I strongly believe in the adage of "hacking to learn" rather than "learning to hack". The application has features such as

  • A flexible and simple AJAX based UI to enter tasks and time spent
  • Track time across multiple projects, clients and team members
  • View utilization reports for team members based on projects and clients
  • Visualize utilization reports as charts

In the process of hacking on this application, I learnt the usage of several gems like Devise for authentication, CanCan for authorization, SimpleForm for forms, Javascript with JQuery, testing with RSpec, Git/Github for source control and Twitter Bootstrap for UI.
